document_data.name: Basem bin Rumi
document_data.mainbody: '''Basem bin Rumi''' was a [[gnome]] alchemist and researcher living in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Basem was a friendly fellow who was easily distracted by fantasies. His sense of humor made adventuring with Basem a pleasure. He was also incredibly resourceful under stress.
document_data.Description: Fashion was important to Basem. He always dressed himself in fine silks and a gold-colored [[fez]].
document_data.Activities:
Driven by what some considered a foolish pursuit, Basem spent much of his fortune attempting to discover a way to turn metals such as [[lead]] or [[copper]] into [[gold]]. His home was littered with large mechanical water clocks while he tried to discover new methods of making them more efficient.

Basem resorted to adventuring any time his funds ran low. He also sold magical potions to other adventurers.
document_data.History: Basem settled in Huzuz after a successful career spent adventuring on the [[Crowded Sea]] as captain of a ''[[sambuk]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Basem owned a pair of ''[[bracers of defense|bracers of defense AC 5]]'', a ''[[ring of water walking]]'', a  ''[[wand of fear]]'', a ''[[bag of holding]]'' and a multitude of magical [[potion]]s.
